item.title: Source Code Foundation Models are Transferable Binary Analysis Knowledge Bases
item.description: ProRec, a novel framework, bridges the binary-source semantic gap by using a binary-source encoder-decoder model and LLMs, achieving significant improvements in zero-shot binary summarization and func…
